title: 有冇人中意聽 international radio stations

replies.msg:
如題
我就中意以下:

Sydney Nova FM: Kate Tim and Marty
BBC radio 4 Friday Night Comedy
哩嗰就好好笑
News ZB
Radio National
BBC Radio 4
BBC World Service
LBC in London
哩D就時事為主
RadioX Quebec City
FM 93 Quebec City
哩D就用嚟學法文

如有好嘅 pth 台 feel free to recommend
Sor 學緊中文打字
